message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY

Reasoning: The paper presents a system for automatic generation and evaluation of cooking recipes using a pre-trained language model. This falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (ML), which are covered by several sub-categories in arXiv CS. cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category as it specifically deals with NLP and text generation. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are also likely as they cover broader topics related to ML and AI. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is another possible sub-category as it deals with text retrieval and analysis. Finally, cs.CY (Computers and Society) is a less likely but still possible sub-category as the paper discusses the societal implications of the system, such as its potential impact on the food industry.
